title: Snowing Trees
subtitle: Acrylic on Cardstock
alt: snowy covered evergreen trees on a snowy hill with more snowy hills in the background
description:
2024 

This is the first of six winter paintings on the same 9x11 piece of cardstock. I really like the depth and layers on this painting. I tried to use big brush strokes to get the details, and I'm liking my progress on that, but there is still room to improve.
